fr.sii.ogham.helper.email

Class ExpectedEmail

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.helper.email.ExpectedEmailHeader
      • fr.sii.ogham.helper.email.ExpectedEmail

  • public class ExpectedEmail
extends ExpectedEmailHeader
    Class used in tests for ensuring that the email is respected. It provides the following information:
    • The expected subject
    • The expected body
    • The expected sender address
    • The expected recipients (to, cc, bcc)
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExpectedEmail

        public ExpectedEmail(String subject,
                     String body,
                     String from,
                     String... to)
        Initialize the expected email with string values. The body is used as-is and is expected to provide a "plain/text" Mime Type.
        Parameters:
        subject - the expected subject of the email
        body - the expected body of the email in plain text
        from - the expected email sender address
        to - the expected recipients

      • ExpectedEmail

        public ExpectedEmail(String subject,
                     ExpectedContent expectedContent,
                     String from,
                     String... to)
        Initialize the expected email with provided values.
        Parameters:
        subject - the expected subject of the email
        expectedContent - the expected body of the email with the expected Mime Type
        from - the expected email sender address
        to - the expected recipients
